Events

Stay connected with the ATProto Science community through our workshops, conferences, and gatherings. We bring together researchers, developers, and independent scholars to explore new possibilities for science on ATProto.

  1. ATmosphereConf - Mar 2026

    ATmosphereConf is the global AT Protocol community conference. Join us in Vancouver, BC, Canada, March 2026 at the UBC campus. Come early for two days of extended events, deep dives, and local activities, then gather for two full conference days with topics for everyone.

    • 11 December 2025
